subject: Child Care
Amateur Athletics
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Clemson received permission yesterday from the N.C.A.A. to provide assistance like local transportation and child care to a freshman football player who is taking care of his younger brother. Ray Ray McElrathbey, 19, has temporary custody of his 11-year-old brother, Fahmarr, because of his mother’s drug problems and his father’s gambling addiction.
